title: Announcement: Halloween Horror
itunes:title: Announcement: Halloween Horror
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Have a creepypasta you want read? Please send the request to @creepypod or creepypod@gmail.com Have an original creepypasta or horror story you would like narrated and produced by Creepy? Please submit your completed stories (limited to 3000 words) to creepypod@gmail.com

Halloween is coming, it's time to prepare for something...special...


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
